name: CandyFight
description:
CANDY FIGHT

-Paul "Sukairuto" NICOLAS/  sukairuto@gmail.com

Contact us!

THIS GAME IS A DEMO AND A PROTOTYPE, IT'S FATE ISN'T FIXED YET!

"Hey hero, 
the ice king is back and he has frozen all the candy kingdom, and princess bubblegum is trapped in the castle! It seems that you can do many things with the hot chocolate that you are actually eating.... please, stop that and listen to me!
Try to deliver as many people as you can, they will be helpfull to save the princess! But take care, the minions of the ice king are here to stop you in your way to save the princess!
Let's go hero, take your dog with you and deliver princess bubblegum, now!"

 Don't forget to tell us your feedbacks in the comments section!
